entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
